channel.title: Ggseg on Dr. Mowinckel's
channel.description: Recent content in Ggseg on Dr. Mowinckel's

item.title: New {ggseg} with Geom!
item.description: We released a new version of the ggseg R-package for visualizing brain atlases. It features a geom_brain function and position_brain for flexible brain slice positioning in ggplot2. This update enhances atlas plotting, offering more customization and improved visuals.
